title: shap.depenence_plot to multi page pdf
body:
Greetings,
I have searched the doc, but cannot find anything on my use case.  I have a for loop that returns a shap.dependence_plot for every field in the data.  However, when I try to save to pdf, it only saves the first plot.  I have no issue when I leave the show=True parameter blank.  I am able to view all plots.  However, when saving to pdf, I switch show=False, and only the first plot is returned in the pdf.  I want a mult page pdf with all plots.  Are you able to help?

````python
def shap_dependence_report(shap_values, X_shap,  X_shap_disp, col1, alpha):  
    import shap  
    shap.dependence_plot(ind=col1,  
 shap_values=shap_values[1],  
                    features=X_shap,  
                    display_features=X_shap_disp,  
                    interaction_index=col1,  
                    alpha=alpha,  
                    show=False,  
                )  

cols = X_shap_disp.columns[~X_shap_disp.columns.isin(['obfsc_field'])]
for col in cols:
    shap_dependence_report(shap_values, X_shap,  X_shap_disp, col, alpha=0.5)
    plt.savefig("data/reports/dependence_plot.pdf")
````
